data.name: Absence of Faith
data.note:
Builds 25 Righteous Fury
Requires 9 points in Path of Wrath
data.description: You call on Sigmar to Cripple your enemy for 10 seconds, causing all healing effects used on them to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Avatar of Sigmar
data.description: Increases the Strength, Willpower, Toughness, Initiative, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence of all group mates withing 100 feet by 50 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Bludgeon
data.description: A powerful attack which deals 152 damage to your enemy.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Breath of Sigmar
data.description: Resurrects a fallen ally with 20% health.

data.name: Castigation
data.description: A strike that deals 76 damage to your enemy, and an additional 115 damage over 10 seconds, and reduces their Initiative by 50.

data.name: Charged Fury
data.description: Attacks which generate Righteous Fury will now generate 10 additional points.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Cleansing Power
data.description: If Purify is used on an ally, it will additionally remove an effect from each of your groupmates. This will neither affect you nor trigger when Purify is used on yourself. Purify will remove only one effect per target

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Divine Aegis
data.description: Restores 240 health over 7 seconds, and increases your armor by 1320.

data.name: Divine Aid
data.description: Heals an ally for 258 points, and an additional 315 over 5 seconds.

data.name: Divine Amazement
data.description: You call upon the power of Sigmar, dealing 300 damage every second to all enemies in a 30 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Sigmar returns all the damage done to your enemies to you as health.

data.name: Divine Assault
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, attacking their very spirit and offering it up to Sigmar's will. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing 84 Spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your healing becomes 20% less effective.

data.name: Divine Justice
data.description: Prayer of Righteousness will now deal 258 Spirit damage.

data.name: Divine Light
data.note:
Requires 40 Righteous Fury
Requires 5 points in Path of Salvation
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 775 damage for each person.

data.name: Divine Mend
data.description: A quick heal that restores 468 health.Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Divine Petitioning
data.description: Reduces Supplication's cost by 15 Action Points.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Divine Replenishment
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become more driven. For the next 10 seconds, anytime they hit an enemy with a melee attack, they will regain 50 Action Points.

data.name: Divine Reward
data.description: After healing an ally with Divine Aid or Healing Hand, there is a 25% chance that your next attack will not cost any action points.

data.name: Divine Shock
data.description: The force of Sigmar's displeasure slams into all enemies in front of you, up to 30 feet away, and sends them flying backwards.

data.name: Divine Warding
data.description: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 475 damage.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Endless Guilt
data.description: The snare from Weight Of Guilt will now last for 10 seconds, and affects all enemies within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Exalted Defenses
data.description: Any time you defend against an attack, your healing abilities will become 20% more effective for 10 seconds.

data.name: Fanaticism
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your chance to parry by 10%, but reduces the effectiveness of your healing abilities by 20%.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Fueled Fury
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 Righteous Fury. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by 825, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by 25, and all Resists by 315 for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Grace of Sigmar
data.description: The base heal on Sigmar's Radiance is increased to 291 health and the healing from damage dealt increased to 75%.

data.name: Greave of Sigmar
data.description: Sigmar's Fist will now also increase your ally's Toughness as well, and will reduce your enemy's Strength and Toughness by 75.

data.name: Guilty Soul
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a direct damage ability in the Path Of Wrath, your target will suffer an additional 405 Spirit Damage over 9 seconds. Your defensive target will also be healed for any damage dealt.

data.name: Hammer of Sigmar
data.note:
Builds 30 Righteous Fury
Requires 13 points in Path of Wrath
Requires a Greatweapon
data.description: Deals 127 damage to the target, If the target is below 50% hit points, instead inflicts 350 damage and will always critically hit. Successful hit grants Accelerated Intimation, a blessing which cuts cast times in half.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Hastened Divinity
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Healing Hand
data.description: Heals your target for 1700 points over 15 seconds.

data.name: Intimidating Repent
data.description: Repent will now affect all enemies within 30 feet of your target.

data.name: Judgement
data.description: You call down the holy judgement of Sigmar, dealing 102 Spirit damage to the enemy.

data.name: Leading the Prayer
data.description: Whenever Prayer Of Devotion heals one of your groupmates, you will also become healed for the same amount.

data.name: Martyr's Blessing
data.note:
Requires 20 Righteous Fury per second
Requires 13 points in Path of Salvation
data.description:
You open your soul to Sigmar and become a living force of holy power for up to 3 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration. Each second, all allies within 30 feet of you will regain 179 health, and you will consume 20 Righteous Fury.
This effect will end if you lose your concentration or if you run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Penance
data.description: You attack all targets within 30 feet for 1200 damage and Stagger them for 6 seconds,preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Pious Restoration
data.note:
Requires 40 Righteous Fury
Requires 9 points in Path of Salvation
data.description: You call upon Sigmar to Bless everyone in your group within 100 feet, restoring 475 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Prayer of Absolution
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: You chant a bolstering prayer, increasing the armor of group mates who stay within 100 feet of you by 412.

data.name: Prayer of Devotion
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you attacks an enemy, there is a 20% chance that they will regain 200 health.

data.name: Prayer of Righteousness
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet hits an enemy, there is a 20% chance they will deal an additional 150 Spirit damage.

data.name: Purge
data.note:
Builds 25 Righteous Fury
Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and does 127 damage.

data.name: Purify
data.note:
Requires 25 Righteous Fury
Target must be Cursed or Hexed
data.description: You purify an ally, removing one Curse or Hex.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Refreshing Radiance
data.description: Whenever you heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 Action Points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Repent
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Shield of Faith
data.description: Increases your chance to Disrupt enemy spells by 10%.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.

data.name: Sigmar's Fist
data.description: A blessed attack which deals 127 damage to your target, and increases your defensive target's Strength by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Sigmar's Grace
data.description: The might of Sigmar infuses everyone in your group within 100 feet, increasing their Wounds by 50 for 1 hour.

data.name: Sigmar's Radiance
data.description: You smash into your enemy, dealing 155 damage to them. The power of Sigmar erupts from your weapon, healing any of your groupmates within 100 feet for 232 health plus 50% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Sigmar's Shield
data.note:
Builds 25 Righteous Fury
Requires 9 points in Path of Grace
data.description: You smash your weapon into your enemy, dealing 177 damage to them. Your defensive target becomes Blessed for up to 20 seconds, and will regain 100 health each time they're attacked. You will lose 15 Righteous Fury every second, and the effect will end if you run out of Righteous Fury to power it with.

data.name: Sigmar's Vision
data.note:
Builds 30 Righteous Fury
Requires 5 points in Path of Grace
data.description: Deals 177 damage to your enemy and Blesses your defensive target for 15 seconds, increasing their chance to parry attacks by 10%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Smite
data.description: A sweeping blow which deals 103 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 50 feet away.Builds an additional 15 Righteous Fury for each enemy that you strike.

data.name: Soulfire
data.note:
Builds 35 Righteous Fury
Requires 5 points in Path of Wrath
data.description: Deals 390 Spirit damage over 9 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Supplication
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will convert 30 action points into 30 Righteous Fury every second. If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Touch of the Divine
data.description: Restores 643 health to all group mates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Vow of Silence
data.description: A powerful strike which deals 177 damage to your enemy and knocks the wind out of them for 4 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Weight of Guilt
data.description: Deals 177 damage to your target. If they are Cursed, then they will also become snared, reducing their run speed by 40% for 6 seconds.
